item.description:
Plot: In the year 2017, a plague has transformed most every human into vampires. Faced with a dwindling blood supply, the fractured dominant race plots their survival; meanwhile, a researcher works with a covert band of vamps on a way to save humankind. Starring: Ethan Hawke, Willem Dafoe, Sam Neill, Isabel Lucas, Vince Colosimo, Jay Lagaâ€™aia, Claudia Karvan, Christopher Kirby, Michael Dorman, Mungo McKay, Emma Randall Directed by: Michael Spierig, Peter Spierig Release Date: January 8, 2010

item.name: Daybreakers
